triplets: Footwear designed to protect the feet, typically made from processed animal hide and used for formal, casual, and functional purposes
Foot protection, walking, professional wear, fashion styling, and formal occasions
Processed leather, rubber or leather soles, stitching threads, and inner lining materials
Upper section made of leather that covers and protects the foot
Sole that provides support, cushioning, and traction while walking
Available in various colors such as black, brown, tan, and other dyed finishes
Fashion industry, footwear manufacturing sector, and personal apparel collections
Various footwear brands, leather craftsmen, and commercial shoe manufacturers
Approximately 500–900 grams per pair depending on size, design, and sole material
Typically 2–5 years with regular use, depending on leather quality and maintenance
